analysis.description:
DRPCrowdsale.executeTransfer (/unique_chucks/3/0xd42433a8a0a1ceb73c8ff4e432463e2ee109039d.sol#352-384) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- ! transferProposal.dcorpAddress.send(this.balance) (/unique_chucks/3/0xd42433a8a0a1ceb73c8ff4e432463e2ee109039d.sol#378-383)

DRPCrowdsale.onlyShareholders (/unique_chucks/3/0xd42433a8a0a1ceb73c8ff4e432463e2ee109039d.sol#125-132) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- drpToken.balanceOf(msg.sender) == 0
	- drpToken.balanceOf(msg.sender) == 0

Reentrancy in DRPCrowdsale.fallback (/unique_chucks/3/0xd42433a8a0a1ceb73c8ff4e432463e2ee109039d.sol#389-402):
	External calls:
	- ! drpToken.issue(msg.sender,valueInDRP) (/unique_chucks/3/0xd42433a8a0a1ceb73c8ff4e432463e2ee109039d.sol)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- stage (/unique_chucks/3/0xd42433a8a0a1ceb73c8ff4e432463e2ee109039d.sol)

Reentrancy in DRPCrowdsale.vote (/unique_chucks/3/0xd42433a8a0a1ceb73c8ff4e432463e2ee109039d.sol#322-340):
	External calls:
	- weight = drpToken.balanceOf(msg.sender) (/unique_chucks/3/0xd42433a8a0a1ceb73c8ff4e432463e2ee109039d.sol#334-336)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- transferProposal (/unique_chucks/3/0xd42433a8a0a1ceb73c8ff4e432463e2ee109039d.sol#336-337)
	- transferProposal (/unique_chucks/3/0xd42433a8a0a1ceb73c8ff4e432463e2ee109039d.sol#338-339)

Reentrancy in DRPCrowdsale.executeTransfer (/unique_chucks/3/0xd42433a8a0a1ceb73c8ff4e432463e2ee109039d.sol#352-384):
	External calls:
	- ! drpToken.unlock() (/unique_chucks/3/0xd42433a8a0a1ceb73c8ff4e432463e2ee109039d.sol#360-364)
	- ! drpToken.startIncentiveDistribution() (/unique_chucks/3/0xd42433a8a0a1ceb73c8ff4e432463e2ee109039d.sol#364-369)
	- drpToken.transferOwnership(transferProposal.dcorpAddress) (/unique_chucks/3/0xd42433a8a0a1ceb73c8ff4e432463e2ee109039d.sol#370-371)
	External calls sending eth:
	- ! transferProposal.dcorpAddress.send(this.balance) (/unique_chucks/3/0xd42433a8a0a1ceb73c8ff4e432463e2ee109039d.sol#378-383)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- stage (/unique_chucks/3/0xd42433a8a0a1ceb73c8ff4e432463e2ee109039d.sol#383-384)

Reentrancy in DRPCrowdsale.fallback (/unique_chucks/3/0xd42433a8a0a1ceb73c8ff4e432463e2ee109039d.sol#389-402):
	External calls:
	- ! drpToken.issue(msg.sender,valueInDRP) (/unique_chucks/3/0xd42433a8a0a1ceb73c8ff4e432463e2ee109039d.sol)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- balances (/unique_chucks/3/0xd42433a8a0a1ceb73c8ff4e432463e2ee109039d.sol)
	- raised (/unique_chucks/3/0xd42433a8a0a1ceb73c8ff4e432463e2ee109039d.sol)
